Hellpeon smirked as he reached behind his wings and then pulled out 
four cred cards each with an abnormal amount of card on them. Which 
likely were pulled from some dead cybertronian bodies during the 
various attacks on the planet during his time period.

Hellpeon: "Credits... show me only the best..."

--- In nbwrpg@y..., "Takashi Owa" <KSLawdogg@c...> wrote:
> > 
> > Hellpeon: "Where are your most powerful weapons?"
> 
> The shopkeeper looked up, motioning for two thugs to stand down as 
> they were approaching Hellpeon.  "We have plasma cannons, missile 
> launchers, and some other stuff.  What do you plan on paying with?"
